channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：欧盟对核电越来越感兴趣，而 Nadia Calviño 的欧洲投资银行可以提供帮助。丽贝卡-克里斯蒂（Rebecca Christie）认为，为了避免欧盟在小型核反应堆方面 "落后于形势"，欧洲投资银行的融资可以发挥重要作用 #BVTV
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The European Union is getting excited about nuclear power, and Nadia Calviño’s European Investment Bank can help. For the EU to avoid getting 'behind the curve' on small nuclear reactors, EIB financing can make a difference, Rebecca Christie argues #BVTV pic.twitter.com/flu2WnRGEl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉正在中国加强电动汽车价格战。该公司为购车者推出了一系列新的优惠措施。在三月底之前从库存中购买新车的人现在可以获得价值高达约4800美元的优惠。
item.description:
WATCH: Tesla is stepping up a price war over electric cars in China. The firm rolled out a range of new incentives for buyers. People picking up new cars from stock by the end of March can now get perks worth up to around $4,800 https://t.co/JIJUKjeBw8 pic.twitter.com/FgHn4gGfVg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 印度 Paytm 支付银行因涉嫌洗钱被罚款超过 66.2 万美元
item.description:
India's Paytm Payments Bank fined over $662,000 for alleged money laundering https://t.co/XmPTpWJlev pic.twitter.com/VNIutSUm5T

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Meta Platforms 表示，它将停止为 Facebook 上出现的内容向澳大利亚新闻出版商支付费用，从而与堪培拉展开新一轮较量。更多信息
item.description:
Meta Platforms said it will stop paying Australian news publishers for content that appears on Facebook, setting up a fresh battle with Canberra which had led the world with a law that forces internet giants to strike licensing deals. Read more https://t.co/923MXgdR6W pic.twitter.com/9I6A5XpOTD

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 中国的采购经理人指数（PMI）凸显了经济复苏的不平衡，在市场呼吁采取更大胆的刺激措施和改革以保障北京长期增长潜力之际，中国政府继续面临压力。更多信息
item.description:
China's PMI highlighted an uneven economic recovery, maintaining pressure on authorities as markets clamor for bolder stimulus measures and reforms to safeguard Beijing's long-term growth potential. Read more: https://t.co/89aMQFRQxW pic.twitter.com/eDZVEjhHmg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Meta Platforms 表示，它将停止为 Facebook 上出现的内容向澳大利亚新闻机构付费。这一决定与澳大利亚政府和 2021 年迫使互联网巨头达成许可协议的法律背道而驰。更多信息
item.description:
Meta Platforms has said it will stop paying Australian news outlets for content that appears on Facebook. The decision pits it against the Australian government and a 2021 law that forced internet giants to strike licensing deals. Read more https://t.co/923MXgeoWu pic.twitter.com/AMJ9dkVF1Q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 中国 2 月份采购经理人指数从 1 月份的 49.2 降至 49.1，其中产出部分大幅下降。该指数低于区分增长与萎缩的 50 分界线，与路透社调查的预测中值 49.1 一致。更多信息
item.description:
China's PMI fell to 49.1 in February from 49.2 in January with a sizeable drop in the output component. It was below the 50-mark separating growth from contraction and in line with a median forecast of 49.1 in a Reuters poll. Read more: https://t.co/89aMQFRQxW pic.twitter.com/eOVuYbN9F4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 白宫表示，美国正在对中国汽车进口是否构成国家安全风险展开调查，并可能因对 "互联 "汽车技术的担忧而实施限制。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The United States is opening an investigation into whether Chinese vehicle imports pose national security risks and could impose restrictions due to concerns about ‘connected’ car technology, the White House said. More here: https://t.co/pts7s3V1hF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：德意志银行正准备在香港对中国开发商世茂集团提起清算诉讼，这是在信贷违约上升和中国房地产行业危机加深的背景下，一家外国公司采取的罕见举措。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Deutsche Bank is preparing a liquidation lawsuit in Hong Kong against Chinese developer Shimao Group, in a rare move by a foreign firm that comes amid rising credit defaults and China's deepening property sector crisis. More here: https://t.co/BlMYrNhZx3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024
